website_summaries.verdict: This vegan protein powder is extremely affordable, especially when you consider that it's 100% organic.
pros: Not only is it organic, it's also gluten-free, soy-free, non-GMO, and free from artificial coloring, flavoring, and preservatives
We love that it's smooth, flavorful, and not at all gritty
cons: At 21g per serving, it has a lower protein content than some alternatives

customer_reviews.title: An amazing product for so many reasons
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying this for a couple of years now. An amazing product for so many reasons; taste, ease of mixing, and plant based. I go through 1-2 per month. I have one little gripe that won't cost it a star... but the containers are 1/2 full? I know manufacturers are trying to cut costs by shrinking the amounts purchased, but when you get a fairly robust plastic container that's only 1/2 full... it's getting ridiculous. It's a waste of plastic and turns an otherwise wonderful product into a scam. Come on Orgain, you are better than that.
customer_reviews.author: Forest King

customer_reviews.title: No hunger for hours!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the creamy chocolate and started replacing 1-2 meals a day with it. I can’t compare this with any other protein shake mix because this is the first powdered protein mix I’ve bought. However, I can tell you that the taste is great. It can be a little chalky at first, but after learning how to blend it right with Nutra Ninja bullet, there is not really any chalkiness or grit to it especially if you add a banana and a handful of ice to it. I use unsweetened vanilla almond milk as the base. The best part is I’m not hungry for about 4.5 hours which was my goal. I’ll be ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: AllisonRN

customer_reviews.title: awful
customer_reviews.text: I looked for contact information before writing this review, in hopes of sending my distaste for this product directly to the seller, but alas I could not. So, here's my review - I've been drinking protein shakes for years and wanted to switch to something without any fake sugars and possibly organic. I just drank my first shake with this product and literally gagged. It is gritty and the taste is nasty. I've had other products from Orgain and like them, but this - not so much. I cannot recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: TammyK777

customer_reviews.title: The Best, Hands Down. . .
customer_reviews.text: I started with almond milk (lactose issues), then went to a 50/50 almond milk and water. I found it broke down quicker with the 50/50 blend. The flavor is great. I've tried a number of powders over the years and this one is the best. I've changed my diet, so ingredients are key. There are no artificial any things in this one. They use Stevia, which is a natural sweetener that is better for your body than anything else (other than Xylitol). If you are not used to Stevia, it may take a little to "come to the dark side", but your body will appreciate it!
customer_reviews.author: James Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Wondering if amount in container is correct...?
customer_reviews.text: This tastes much better... Trying to lose weight... looked into Slim Fast, didn't like the ingredients... Was looking for something that didn't have sucralose or whatever other artificial sweeteners or junk in it... tried other products sweetened with Stevia didn't like the taste... this is pretty much the only one I've been able to actually enjoy... blended it with frozen bananas, coconut milk and a table spoon unsweetened cocoa, tastes great. Only issue was it came in a huge container, was overly excited at the amount for the price but when I opened all the seals and opened the container it was literally half full... overall good.
customer_reviews.author: Sweetness

customer_reviews.title: By far my favorite protein powder
customer_reviews.text: By far my favorite protein powder! I've tried this and the Garden of Life RAW Protein, and this one tastes and mixes considerably better, isn't chalky, and doesn't get watery (unlike the GoL protein). I blend it with almond milk, frozen strawberries, a banana, and some ground flaxseed, and it keeps me full and energized. Reading some of the reviews, it looks like people have experienced digestive problems with this powder, but I haven't had any issues. As a college student, I really appreciate the reasonable price and high quality. If you're looking for a quality plant-based protein but don't have $50 to spend, Orgain is a fantastic deal!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite for a healthy Mocha Coffee breakfast shake!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I've ordered the chocolate, and it's very good. I usually get vanilla since chocolate is heavy with many brands, but this one is more of a cocoa powder flavor. My favorite recipe is mix concentrated cold brew coffee, a few ice cubes, 2 scoops of Orgain Chocolate Protein powder, and a little creamer (I use almond or coconut milk) and run it through your blender. Amazing all in one mocha breakfast!!
customer_reviews.author: LAX Angela

customer_reviews.title: It's time for a shake and I'm gagging over here.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is gross!!!! I've had Isagenix for a year and was looking to save $ so I switched to Orgain and it's cheaper but disgusting. I don't know how this stuff is so highly rated. Tastes like feet. Unfortunately they do not allow returns. Save your money and taste test it first!!!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Barry

customer_reviews.title: Recipe has changed and this is now awful.
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS. I don't know what they've done to this protein powder but it's terrible now. The quality is significantly worse than it ever was; it was once soft and powdery. Mixed with milk and water, it was deliciously creamy. Now it's gritty and tastes disgusting. I'm very disappointed because this was once the best plant-based protein powder out there. What happened? I'll be purchasing elsewhere from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Half Empty??
customer_reviews.text: Review is solely based on packaging, not taste, quality, etc. yet as I haven't tried it yet. I ordered two 2lb.containers, chocolate & vanilla, since I pre-mix all my dry ingredients into small containers to speed up my shake making process in the mornings. Wow was I surprised when I cracked open the seals on both of these; they were half empty. I'm sure it's sold by weight rather than volume, but come on. These tubs are twice the size they need to be & take up too much room in the pantry. In today's eco-friendly environment you expect more (or less in this case)
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Caused Me Serious Indigestion
customer_reviews.text: For someone like me with an iron stomach, this product caused me the worst boughs of indigestion I've ever experienced. Strangely the ingredients list wouldn't suggest this effect for me, but after a week on with indigestion, a week break, and trying again, it is absolutely this product that's causing my issue. Hopefully you don't have the same experience.
customer_reviews.author: G. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Used to be good, now not.
customer_reviews.text: This was one of my favorite protein shakes, until they changed the ingredients, now I want to puke from the overwhelming stevia flavoring. I had to throw away my shake and brush my teeth because I couldn't handle it. Very disappointed. Anyone sensitive to fake/alternate sugars beware.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two recent bad batches
customer_reviews.text: I order this product every two months or so. My order from October 21st tasted great, same great product I've come to expect. My order on December 14th tastes awful. Something changed with the flavor between those dates, and it honestly tastes like garbage now. I ordered it again on January 20th thinking it might've been a bad batch, but it still had the same bad taste. I'm really disappointed, as I've been ordering this for over a year now and I guess I'll have to find a substitute. Really a shame.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Formula Changed And I Am So Sad
customer_reviews.text: sigh. orgain was once a friend. a best friend even. but they changed the formula and it's just gross i can't do it. im sad. i cant even write a bad review because its just so disgusting im genuinely disappointed and feel honestly let down. i want to say don't buy it but like...eh everyone's different i suppose and ya never know. but you'll also never know how amazing it once was. now, i have to add "find a new protein powder" to my list of things to do. bye orgain.
customer_reviews.author: Nava

customer_reviews.title: Why?
customer_reviews.text: Wish these companies didn’t think it was necessary to overload every one of these powders with artificial sweeteners. Edit: had to go down from 3 stars to 1, the first drink I made with this stuff I had to force myself to finish it and almost vomited in the process. Please stop loading these powders up with disgusting artificial sweeteners!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ean

customer_reviews.title: Love.This.Protein
customer_reviews.text: After buying a few of these multiple times, I can now say that I am a repeat customer. I get chocolate and it blends so well and tastes amazing. Never have clumps and even look forward to the time I get to drink my protein shake. My only backlash is that the container is about 60-70% full. I assume it's a marketing move to make it look like there is more than there is in there but it is misleading and a waste of plastic. Even with that complaint I still think its a delicious product that I believe I have been seeing good results from using.
customer_reviews.author: Conner McNally

customer_reviews.title: Do not take on flight. TSA will take it.
customer_reviews.text: My fiance put some of the creamy chocolate protein powder in a bag to take on his business trip, TSA pulled him aside for it to be searched, then took the protein powder away. I don't know what's in it that would cause such alarm. The vanilla flavor is okay. I'd mix it in a smoothie or something. The chocolate is good. The peanut butter chocolate is best. My guy takes about 4 scoops per day and is getting enough protein on vegan diet for muscle growth. This stuff works. Tastes better than other vegan protein powders. It's less chalky than others.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: Over 30% of the container is empty!
customer_reviews.text: Although the drink was tasty and was easily dissolved in milk or water, it did have a slight aftertaste. My rating is based only on the information below.: Over 30% of the container is empty. It appears the manufacturer is attempting to induce a purchase by deceiving the consumers about the actual quantity provided and wastefully contributing to the masses of discarded plastic plaguing our lands and oceans. If you found this review helpful, please vote helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Efstathios

customer_reviews.title: New Formula No Good
customer_reviews.text: I have Crohn's disease and have been depending on these shakes for awhile now both to help me get my necessary protein and to provide a breakfast I can actually eat. I'd noticed my body had been responding to them differently lately and assumed it was a flare up. Unfortunately I just discovered that the company changed the formula and added an artificial sweetener, erythritol. Anybody with digestive issues knows that artificial sweeteners are not our friend. This shake now passes through me so quickly I could use it to prep for a colonoscopy. Other than stop buying this product, I don't know what I'm going to do.
customer_reviews.author: Karen L.

customer_reviews.title: Great for smoothies
customer_reviews.text: We've been using this protein powder for about 2 months now. I haven't noticed any graininess. We add one scoop per serving in our morning smoothies. Per person, we add: 1 scoop protein powder, 1 banana, 1 c frozen fruit, and 1 c unsweetened almond milk. The result is like a milkshake, only good for you. It is filling enough to get us to lunch if needed, though we often add a more rounded breakfast after exercise. Bottom line: if you are looking for a good plant-based option that tastes good in a smoothy, this is a good choice. And, since we can't find anything locally to compare for the price, this seems like a pretty good buy to us.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: Blend with left over coffee, water, ice- and if you like creamer, add that too- it’s absolutely amazing. My fave is the vanilla- blend with a banana, water and ice- add berries if you like- so so good. Great with almost milk and yogurt as well, but honestly there’s enough texture and flavor it’s by no means required- just plain water works great. This stuff really is delicious.
customer_reviews.author: jbnonc

customer_reviews.title: BEST & LAST you will ever need!
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST and the LAST protein drink I have tried. Finally, a smooth, non-grainy, creamy protein powder! NO AFTERTASTE, just creamy and delicious chocolate - more like dessert! Bought the chocolate fudge, mixed with 1/2 almond milk, 1/2 water and two ice cubes. Delicious. This is now my permanent protein powder. Worth all the stars given by other customers. BONUS: Price is super affordable compared to other vegan organic powders!
customer_reviews.author: Robin Sauer

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent nutrition info
customer_reviews.text: I buy this regularly b/c it's easy to blend in a blender bottle, tastes good, and has a nice balance of fiber/protein/carbs, but it seems like the nutrition info has changed since the last one I bought. The pictures on the website description say 7g fiber, 21g protein, and 3g net carbs, but my most recent order says on the front of the container 6g fiber, 21g protein, 4g net carbs. Why is this different? It makes me feel suspicious that this just changed all of a sudden and the website item description doesn't match. I won't buy again until this is sorted out.
customer_reviews.author: Rubiella

customer_reviews.title: Very bad experience.....
customer_reviews.text: I tried this product twice. It made my violently ill, both times. I mixed it according to the directions. In both cases, within about 3 hrs, I was vomiting, and then horrible diarrhea. It took me about 12 hrs to start feeling normal again. I don't know if it's the product in general, or if something in the containers I received, but I was NOT willing to try it again. Amazon refunded my money, and I threw out all the rest of it. I carefully read the reviews before I purchased, and then after the first go around...but I didn't see anything about projectile vomiting or explosive diarrhea. But that's exactly what I got....so for what it's worth......
customer_reviews.author: Scott B.

customer_reviews.title: Probably the best protein shake I've tried
customer_reviews.text: For starters: I've had a love / hate relationship with protein shakes for my entire life. I really love drinking shakes as a part of healthy active lifestyle routine. BUT! The vast majority of them cause major stomach issues for me and many of them make me feel sick / nauseous. This ones does not, or at least not as much as other shakes, thank god! Causes mild stomach issues sometimes, but the key here is to never mix it with milk, even oatmilk / almond milk, WATER ONLY = no stomach problems. The FLAVOR is really great, I love it. Love the texture, too, blends really great! All in all, I can honestly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as Good as Sweet Vanilla Bean, but Amazing Product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It has protein and fiber that agrees with my lactose intolerant self. The chocolate isn't wow, but it is chocolate. I was going to use it to put in my chocolate pudding made with almond milk to get the protein I needed to heal after surgery, but I decided the sugar in the pudding would impede my healing. Instead I drank it with 8 ounces of almond milk over the course of the 20 days all the while longingly looking at the Sweet Vanilla Bean that tasted like vanilla cake mix waiting to finish it. BUY THE VANILLA!!!
customer_reviews.author: Christa

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting nutrition
customer_reviews.text: As a diabetic trying to lose weight while recuperating from 2 knee replacement surgeries I have to get proper nutrition and this product has really helped me reach my goals. It tastes good, blends well and is good for everyone including vegetarians. I have been using it for 3 years as part of my weight loss and physical therapy regimen. Over 60 pounds lost and 3 surgeries later I will keep this as a part of my diabetes management program for the rest of my life.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Caution gerd sufferers
customer_reviews.text: If you suffer from gerd or have any digestive issues STAY AWAY from this product. It gave me bad indigestion I almost landed in the hospital. The pain and difficulty breathing caused by this product is not worth it. Both the vanilla and chocolate are not a bad tasting product as long as you can tolerate it. I bought multiple orders of both and I regretted i tremendously. I went back to vegansmart vanilla flavor. In my opinion it taste better and I have no issues with it whatsoever
customer_reviews.author: Parone

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive for such a small amount
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product for a few weeks, because that is how long it lasts. Contrary to what others say, it does not keep me full nor have I lost any weight, but gained it. I ordered another container to give it another try. I’m not at all impressed with this powder. It’s just not what I thought it would be. The flavor is fine and it mixes well, but that’s about it. The container is also only half full. Seems like you are not getting what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Rita M.

customer_reviews.title: Yum.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a vegan, but my friend said I should still try this. New favorite. Awesome taste and great consistency when mixed. Try this - 1 frozen banana - 8 oz. Unsweetened vanilla almond milk - 2 heaping tbsp peanut butter - 2 scoops of this - small tbsp of Hershey's cocoa powder - 2 tbsp chia seeds
customer_reviews.author: Wesley

customer_reviews.title: Not a Perfect Product
customer_reviews.text: Pros: It has lots of fiber It has no cholesterol It has no sugar It is a good value Cons: I don't know what the taste is, but it SAF is not chocolate. It was more like kitty litter flavor. I literally choked it down. Its texture is GRITTY and thick, like drinking pudding that is full of sand. I guess you take the bad with the good, but I won't be buying it again.
customer_reviews.author: Bazooka Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great taste!! Only half full....
customer_reviews.text: I really do love this protein powder it is by far my favorite on the market and it's plant based and organic. Can't beat that! But, there is always a but..... Sam's club has the same size tub which is fuller than the Amazon tub. The Amazon tub is only half full at 2.03 lbs and Sam's club is much more full at 2.74 lbs. I always get mine at Sam's club but ordered for Amazon because of covid 19. Pretty disappointed about the half full tub... Hint: orgain you can do better than that. ❤️ But the taste and quality is amazing so thank you for that!!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: CONTAINS ERYTHRITOL!!!
customer_reviews.text: Tasted great, however this contains Erythritol, which gave me horrible stomach cramps, headaches, diarrhea, and bloating. I wouldn’t recommend to anyone with sensitive stomach or IBS syndrome :( Unfortunately I will not be purchasing this brand ever again :(
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Brown

customer_reviews.title: MSG?
customer_reviews.text: To be honest, the taste is fine. I still wonder what ingredient does cause so much intestinal bloating. I consumed one shake for the breakfast and nothing else! I feel like my day is ruined! Maybe others have better tolerance for this product, but mine is going straight to the trash. I tried the other brand and was just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Which I was so disappointed because it tastes sooooo good
customer_reviews.text: I found out I was allergic to Cow's Milk and I had to stop drinking Whey protein. Which I was so disappointed because it tastes sooooo good. I have tried many plant based proteins and they have been awful, so disgusting. I had to mix so much fruit and PB2 in there just so I can bare the taste. This is the first protein powder I can have straight up with some almond milk. I love it. It's not as good as whey protein but this is the best plant based protein I have ever tried. I got this in the chocolate flavor even though I am not big chocolate protein flavor, I enjoy this one.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great
customer_reviews.text: I just got this stuff (chocolate) as a meal replacement for when I don’t have time to eat. I shook it in a tumbler with just water and it mixed VERY WELL. No clumps at all. I love the taste of it. I feel satisfied. I’m not really sure what some of these reviewers are complaining about. It’s chocolatey tasting. If you’re expecting Hershey’s syrup, then just go buy that.....🙄 I think this stuff tastes great! I just ordered the peanut butter flavor too.
customer_reviews.author: S. C.

customer_reviews.title: Top 3 product in its category
customer_reviews.text: I LOL at the one and two star reviews from other babies in here claiming this taste like chalk and dirt. First and foremost, get your head around the fact that you arent going to get a product like this to taste good without adding something unhealthy into it. Second, this stuff taste pretty darn good compared to a lot of competition, has a pretty good ingredient list, fantastic value per serving while still hitting over 20g protein per serving. There might be another product out there thats better but there is no chance someone should rate this product 1 or 2 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Freeman

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to love this
customer_reviews.text: I like to try different protein powders once in awhile and this one seemed like a good try. I like the idea of plant based protein but unfortunately it just wasn't great. It mixed decently enough with a blender and almond mix but the taste is very "chalky". It also contains Stevia, which can mess with my stomach. Additionally, it lacks BCAA's which many whey powders have, which might matter to you if you are working out. If the lack of BCAA's and inclusion of Stevia doesn't bother you, it might be worth trying but start with a smaller package before you buy bulk so you can give it a taste test.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Finally— I can eat breakfast!
customer_reviews.text: I genuinely like this protein powder. I have been using one scoop in 12 oz of almond milk for my breakfast and it keeps me full until lunch time. The flavor is pleasant and doesn’t remind me overwhelmingly of that chalky taste you get with most proteins. i also enjoy the low carb aspect of it while it still retains its flavor. I think I will try blending with some powdered peanut butter soon!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Y.

customer_reviews.title: functional but not delicious
customer_reviews.text: It's okay.. not delicious... maybe with a banana in it I can deal.... but my main objection is a weirdness about the fact that it is a huge plasic "jar".. . this less that half full. Why? I didn't have a scale to weight it so not sure if I even got the amount I was supposed to. I took a photo with my phone and will post it later. In addition to all that the plastic used is a total stupid thing to do when you are using a jug almost three times the size of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Myrna Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Good, but...
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this brand. Totally organic protein powder plant-based. It had all the things I was looking for except when I started taking it, it would make my heart race and I ended up with palpitations. On the advice of my doctor I discontinue taking it but now I have an unopened jug I can't return.
customer_reviews.author: Loraina

customer_reviews.title: Too bad about the recipe change...
customer_reviews.text: We really wish the recipe for this wasn't changed. We were very happy with the old flavor and had happily used it for a couple of years. The adjustment to the flavor and sweeteners just ruined it for us. For that reason, we're turning to another brand. If the flavor of Stevia doesn't bother you, then perhaps give this a try. We've liked the brand in the past, and prices have been fair, but ultimately it's not for us anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Yum!
customer_reviews.text: A great taste altogether! I could handle it with water, but it was definitely at its prime when mixed with almond milk! As with any powder, it does best when blended (as opposed to just being shaken). However, it was also just fine when I was in a hurry in the mornings and just shook it as I ran out the door. 😅 I never experienced too much of a powdery texture. In fact, it was pretty smooth - no matter the way of mixing. I often blended it with almond milk, flaxseed, kale, and spinach and the chocolate flavor still prevailed. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Savannah

customer_reviews.title: No Wheat!
customer_reviews.text: The older I get the more food allergies I contend with. I am allergic to wheat in all forms - gluten free & organic included. This has no wheat in it and, so far (nearly through first canister) other than a few "toots", there has been no other reaction. The chocolate, with half a banana plus some cold unsweetened chocolate almond milk in my blender makes a yummy breakfast or lunch. Just ordered vanilla bean, too.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tastes horrible...
customer_reviews.text: So... I’ll give it a 2 star because it’s heathy... but it tastes horrible, I mix it with other protein powders because I can’t drink it by itself. I probably won’t be purchasing it again, my kids won’t drink it either. It’s very chalky and hard to swallow...
customer_reviews.author: Carter, Urban

customer_reviews.title: Tastes as good as a protein powder can!
customer_reviews.text: This Orgain protein powder is just what I needed. I'm a new-again mom with a baby and toddler, and with working full time, I need a healthy, filling meal or snack option for when I'm on the go. Normally a plain protein shake would be all I need, but the new baby has a milk-protein intolerance and I had to switch to a completely dairy-free diet overnight. I'm so grateful for this plant-based option that doesn't taste like crap! It mixes well with my almond milk as a base, gets pretty smooth, and the chocolate flavor is actually pretty good. I'll be buying this for as long as I continue my dairy-free diet.
customer_reviews.author: Emily WTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Great recovery drink
customer_reviews.text: Really like the taste, I usually mix it water or almond milk. It tastes better with almond milk than water to be honest but it’s still drinkable even if you mix it with water. Only thing that I would dislike is that half the container is empty when I thought it would be filled up all the way. Although I will be ordering it again!
customer_reviews.author: Narinderjit S.

customer_reviews.title: Better than I thought
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to try a plant-based protein powder, as milk protein often gives me horrible stomach pains. I was wary, but pleasantly surprised by this one. It has a nice chocolate flavor and doesn't leave a bad taste in my mouth, nor does it upset my stomach. I blend this powder with oat milk, peanut butter, and ice (whipped cream mixed into it makes it extra creamy and good!). It has become my go-to afternoon snack - yum!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: quite good!
customer_reviews.text: I have decided to move from regular to vegan protein powders, and bought three types to try: garden of life, orgain, and vega chocalate flavor. To my personal taste, I found Orgain to be quite good 4/5, followed by Vega 3/5, and garden of life last 2/5. To me, 'good' is like a regular Wendy's chocolate frosty. For mixability, Orgain and Vega were excellent 5/5, and Garden of life was pretty good but not quite as good: 4/5.
customer_reviews.author: J Lee

customer_reviews.title: So happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: This is the best protein powder I have ever used. I use it as a meal replacer in the morning and I have fruit with it. I am breastfeeding and this upped my supply and it also keeps me full to help me lose weight. Another perk is I have noticed that i have so much more energy. Seriously, I will buy this product for the rest of my life!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla may

customer_reviews.title: I would not say this is tasty
customer_reviews.text: This tastes so much like chemicals. I’m normally really good at getting myself to eat food/drink that I don’t like so I don’t waste it but I could not get past the taste of this. The aftertaste is horrible. So is the during-taste (lol). No matter what you mix it with or how little of an amount, the overly sweet chemical flavor doesn’t disappear. It isn’t worth it. I ended up using it to throw out frying oil instead of using kitty litter. It also does not stay dissolved. I’ve never tried any other protein powder but I’d recommend anything but this.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Severe Intestional discomfort now! Can't believe this!
customer_reviews.text: Been using it for over 2-3 years no problems. Now I'm getting severe intestinal cramps throught the day after eating this. Did they CHANGE THE FORMULA! I loved the product before but now can't use it!
customer_reviews.author: Robert P

customer_reviews.title: Hot girl winter
customer_reviews.text: Ok so it does taste like hell by itself but instead of water add coconut water... You will thank me later or some fruit for a little razzle in your life. Nothing will be flawless but 150 calories for 21g of protein can we say.... "TRIM spaaa babyy" *Anna Nicole voice**(MAY SHE RIP) I'm about to be slamming for the summer I might just divorce my husband and get a new one!! Wooo
customer_reviews.author: Ashbutle

customer_reviews.title: Purchase to make breakfast or lunch meal replacement
customer_reviews.text: This powder isn't as 'fine' as others so it doesn't seem as messy when making the shake. I have made this with water, almond milk, and soy milk. The soy milk tastes the best and has a more thick milk shake like consistency. Mixing with water is fine and the flavor is good but it lacks the 'shake' like texture for sure. I mix in a shaker with mixing ball (wire) and find that it gets everything mixed although if not shaken well you will get the occasional little lump. Have not tried with a blender or any other additives to the shake so don't know if it would work well for recipes or other mixes.
customer_reviews.author: Buruko

customer_reviews.title: Bestest of the best
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this 9x so far. I'm in love with this protein powder! Last summer I started to try various brands , flavors, vegan, and non-vegan. My husband had coworkers swearing by Orgain and I am floored by the high quality, low priced, and rich chocolate taste this is. Usually I have this in a berry smoothie or sometimes in plain water after workouts. Most protein powders are disgusting with water but not Orgain. Best ever! I am now ording vanilla bean flavor to try. This stuff helps me stay on track with weight.
customer_reviews.author: Eliza

customer_reviews.title: So versatile for so many foods!
customer_reviews.text: Our family goes through a lot of this stuff. It's not only good for your blender bottle, which is delicious with water, nut milk, or a mix of the two like I do, but so much more. Put some pbfit in your shake and it's like drinking a Reese's. Cut up apples or bananas or raspberries or strawberries and dip them in the powder or a thick "pudding" made from the powder. My kids love this! I add it to the Frozen banana ice cream I make a lot! Makes a really yummy soft serve. I can add it to oatmeal, put it in cookie dough, or any other baked goods. It's really versatile!
customer_reviews.author: A. Hart

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: I just love this stuff. I started hating the taste and bloat of whey proteins and most plant based powders I've tried are grainy, but this stuff is amazing! It tastes like a milkshake even when mixed with plain water and it's so smooth. I even love it for dessert sometimes with coconut milk. I highly recommend if you're looking for a good plant-based protein.
customer_reviews.author: MarinMama

customer_reviews.title: Great Alternative to Traditional Whey Protein
customer_reviews.text: If you are a vegan or are just looking for an alternative to whey based protein for medical reasons or just for curiosity sake this protein powder is a great place to start. The price for this product considering the amount of protein in each scoop is pretty decent. There are about 40 scoops in the container which comes to about 20 servings if you use two scoops for the full 21 G of protein as advertised. I purchased the chocolate flavor and it tastes as good as good as any other protein powder that I have had; however, I mostly use it within a blended shake of some kind. I would recommend this and will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Even my Mother likes it.
customer_reviews.text: I first bought this at a local store to try it. It was very good but the price was a little more than what I wanted to spend. So I searched on Amazon and found it for a more reasonable price. I use the recipe on the container which includes almond milk, a frozen banana and almond butter. I add ice as well. It is delicious. I use the unsweetened almond milk. And make sure you peel your banana before freezing. I made one for my Mom and she was hooked. She ordered a container for herself. I like the full feeling I get after drinking. Very satisfying.
customer_reviews.author: A. Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Container too large for amount of product. Scoop buried at bottom of the container.
customer_reviews.text: I add the product to smoothies. No complaints about the taste or ability to blend. However, and I noticed this in other reviews, this very large container wasn't even half full when I received it. And, the scoop is at the very bottom of the container, indicating it was put in first before the product was. WHY? The location of the scoop is not as disappointing as the container size to product quantity. The review I read with this complaint was written some time ago and the problem still exists. So that means they don't intend to fix it. I won't reorder from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Urban Legend

customer_reviews.title: Taste awesome and good nutritional facts
customer_reviews.text: Bought this per a friend’s recommendation. I got the chocolate flavor and you can drink this plain with any milk but tastes more awesome with the recommended ingredients printed in the bottle. I read the ingredients and nutritional facts from my friend’s pic she sent me before I decided to buy it. Those information were the best I’ve seen so far in other protein shakes I had tried before. I usually have a nutritionally heavy and dense breakfast, a 3pm lunch, and this shake as my dinner before 7pm. No snacks needed. I’m diabetic and this formula is working for me.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Love this protein powder! I am a vegan that can get a little lazy with my diet at times so it is nice to have an option on days I don’t feel like cooking a bunch. Yes, it can taste a little chalky. I was worried because of the other negative reviews that it would be nasty, but it isn’t! You can taste a little stevia going on but to me it tastes great. I blend a banana, almond milk and one spoonful of the powder in my Vitamix and have no problem with it. It might be weird to just dump in a glass and try to stir. Overall something I will definitely repurchase!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: My dad likes this stuff, because it doesn't give him stomach issues
customer_reviews.text: My dad decided to go with this brand because he wanted a dairy-free protein option to mix in with smoothies and shakes for post-workout nutrition. It's pretty good for what it is - you definitely can tell it's vegetable-based, but it's not bad tasting at all. If you mix it with other ingredients, it's completely palatable. My dad is on his second tub, plus it's not all that expensive for what it is. I think he'll keep buying it.
customer_reviews.author: BB Jones

customer_reviews.title: Used during pregnancy
customer_reviews.text: I bought the chocolate Orgain protein powder many, many, many times when I was pregnant last year and I drank at least one shake every single day up until the day I gave birth. I had some food aversions for a bit so it felt good to know I could still get some protein and nutrients from the shake. You have to get used to the taste first so you know what to expect next time you drink it. It blended pretty well with the steel wire blending ball I found on amazon. Pregnant again so I’m back to ordering more Orgain! ;)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just add 12oz water
customer_reviews.text: I'm on my 2nd jar, and it tastes great!! I do 2 scoops in 12 ounces of ice cold water, shake well, and let it sit for about 5 min's to dissolve, and thicken. It keeps me full for quite some time. Right now I drink it for breakfast (few hours after my celery juice), and again for lunch. I have 2 -3 light snacks throughout the day, and a hearty meal after my workout and have been steadily losing weight, without any starving feeling.
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: Great for $
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried several protein powders and I have to say overall I like this one the best. It keeps me full, I like the ingredients, and it’s cost effective. The taste isn’t great, it’s chalky, but if I mix it the right way I can deal with it. I blend in my bullet, almond milk, banana, ice, and the protein powder mix. I have this before or after a work out. I have noticed my muscle recovery improve since using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of plastic
customer_reviews.text: I'm a semi-pro bodybuilder. I got this powder because of the latest clinical studies have proven plant based protein to be superior to meat protein in regards heart and vascular health. It taste okay. My only complaint is that the PLASTIC container was half full...Kind of ironic for a company advertising environment friendly ect. They might want to consider wasting less plastic. For the record I'm not a liberal either. I just care about the environment and I'm against false advertisement.
customer_reviews.author: The Dude

customer_reviews.title: Plant based, mixes well & taste great. Wishing for a somewhat full container.
customer_reviews.text: My son and I use this product daily. We both enjoy the taste, ease of mixing, and plant based. He is a grad student and manages he funds well. He has considered an alternative due the expense and is concerned there is only half product in the container. He is certainly more concerned with his health, well-being and the environment so he suggest eliminate the plastic waste by shrinking the plastic container. Or supply the plastic container with a full container.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Williams

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I liked this stuff at first but after a month I felt sick from using it. Can cause some digestive issues in those sensitive. Has a good taste but probably better to get all our nutrition from whole foods .
customer_reviews.author: Jd

customer_reviews.title: It’s good for me!
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t tried a ton of protein powders in my days, but in my limited experience, they’re always a little chalky or have a weird after taste. That being said, this powder is still pretty yummy!! It does have a little bit of a “zero calorie sweetener” aftertaste, but that’s ok. I blend it up with some unsweetened coconut milk in my nutribullet and really enjoy it!
customer_reviews.author: DSDMD

customer_reviews.title: Yum!
customer_reviews.text: I decided to give this brand a try though I tended to only use Vega in the past. I went with the chocolate flavor because I figured if I had a bad reaction to it or it wasn't very good, my husband would probably drink it. It's a little chalky, but the texture honestly doesn't bother me like it usually does with protein shakes. Blended with milk or water, it's honestly really good! When I make a smoothie for myself, my 1 1/2 year old comes up smacking his lips and signing for milk. It's really nice to give him a taste of something that I don't have to feel any kind of guilty about.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: What’s not to like?
customer_reviews.text: Cleanest, tastiest powder I’ve tried. Love the idea that they are making it as organic & healthy as possible with no weird added ingredients. As with all stevia products, there is a mild aftertaste, but it’s very light. I really enjoy it best with strong, black iced coffee (instead of milk or water) and it’s the perfect solution to my 5 hours between meals on workdays because it keeps me satisfied. Good value, too.
customer_reviews.author: L. J. Schrader

customer_reviews.title: I'm not getting this again!
customer_reviews.text: I tried this one in replacement for the one I've tried before because of the price and some of the reviews I read about this product. Though the price of this seems more reasonable compared to the one I've tried. I am not getting this again. I thought I'll get used to drinking this but no! I feel like I am drinking chalk and it is choking me! Too bad, I bought both flavors and open them both, hoping the other flavor will be better... but no luck! :( hays... I can't even finish one...
customer_reviews.author: Dei-Xyre

customer_reviews.title: Not drinkable.
customer_reviews.text: Gross. I bought this because of a great review. After, I noticed they amended the review to say the product had changed and it’s now horrible. I second that. It’s hard to choke this stuff down. It’s gritty and tastes terrible. It feels like drinking water and flour mix, and It doesn’t mix warm or cold. I don’t think I’ll experiment with this brand again. At best I may be able to add this to a baking mix, it’s that grainy. If that’s what it’s for, they should label it that way. I will never purchase this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Jessi

customer_reviews.title: good product-too expensive and a scam
customer_reviews.text: The product is fine but Amazon's "Subscribe" option is a scam. We subscribed when the 2.03lb package was about 60 cents per oz. Now it is nearly 80 cents/oz. I compared unit prices and the increase in 13 months was 32%! I'm done with Amazon subscriptions. When I subscribed it was a good price. But shame on me for subscribing and not checking the price each and every month.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Time to look for something new
customer_reviews.text: This product isn’t bad, however without adding a banana and chia seeds, I would be very hungry. The only way I was able to blend it properly was with my bullet. I purchased it three times at a reasonable price, now I see they’ve raised that price $6.00! Time to find a new drink, I guess you start selling your product and you get greedy! Also if you’re going to raise the price, at the very least fill the container!
customer_reviews.author: Terri Lund

customer_reviews.title: My go to protien
customer_reviews.text: I really love this protein and it’s the best price I can find it for. Great taste in my opinion and love the ingredients. Way better than the whey I was buying before, I can never go back
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Flavor isn’t great.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t love the flavor and the formula is much too grainy honestly. I will say it’s better than most other chocolate protein powders I’ve tried, but still not great. I wouldn’t even drink this if it weren’t for the fact I don’t want to waste it, so instead I add it to my oatmeal and it’s not near as bad! The macros are mediocre at best, I’ve found other protein powders with much higher grams of protein and less carbs. I think if you’re vegan and on the hunt for a protein powder, have at it, but otherwise they’re much better options out there! Try Dymatize Iso100!
customer_reviews.author: Selena C.

customer_reviews.title: Finally a protein powder I can tolerate
customer_reviews.text: Had gastric sleeve surgery in June. Switched whey protein shakes three times, tried with water, Lactaid milk,still could not tolerate them and almost wound up in the ER dehydrated. Used bone broth to supplement protein intake. Decided to try a vegan formula. A friend suggested this so I bought the Chocolate Fudge and unsweetened almond milk. Used a blender because I threw in 2 tablespoons of peanut butter. Mixed GREAT.Tastes good,my fiance even tried some and he is NOT a fan of powdered shakes. Best of all, I have not had an adverse reaction to the powder and that's a win for me. Will continue using this on my journey.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good Protein
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something different other than my usual 100% whey protein so I tried this plant based protein powder. Overall I like it. It is definitely thicker than my normal whey powder so it takes some getting used to as far as mixing goes (I mix only with water). The taste is decent (chocolate flavor), no better or worse than 100% whey. It's a nice change of pace. I did not notice any difference as far as bloating, I thought I might feel less full from this plant based protein versus whey which has dairy in it but not really.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Reordered several times
customer_reviews.text: This gives me the boost I need. The flavor is good when mixed with water but better with coconut milk. I've tried other protein drink mixes and can relate well with the lady in the advertisement on their taste. Yuk!! My wife had me try one she got at the vitamin store. After one swallow, I politely asked her to please put the entire conditioner in the outside garbage before it contaminated the good food that was in our kitchen. It was horrible. Orgain is a good tasting drink that gives me a boost. The premix is obviously better but the mix is not bad
customer_reviews.author: Mike Addington

customer_reviews.title: Super versatile! Add it to acai bowls, oatmeal, smoothies, & dessert
customer_reviews.text: It tastes great! I use a scoop in my smoothie /açaí bowls when the weather is hot outside & I want something cold. When it’s cold weather , I make an oatmeal bowl with a scoop of this powder to add some protein to my plant based breakfast! It makes the oatmeal taste like a warm chocolate dessert. & when I’m on the run & cant sit down to eat, this is perfect in my chocolate berry smoothies. Just throw it in the vitamix with frozen fruits & some nut milk! Tastes like fruit & chocolate candy or ice cream shake without the guilt! I also use it to make vegan banana nice cream!
customer_reviews.author: kungfupimp

customer_reviews.title: Pea protein = lots of gas
customer_reviews.text: This flavor of this protein powder isn't horrible, but the gas it gives you is. The intestinal distress that has been happening is not for the faint of heart. I got this thinking it would be great to shake up for breakfast on my way to work... but wow I just wasn't expecting this sort of reaction. I'm going to finish this stuff because the cheapskate in me won't let me throw it away, buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: Cronzilla

customer_reviews.title: Tastes good. Does not mix well.
customer_reviews.text: It tastes pretty good, but does not mix well. I’ve tried with 12 oz water, 24 oz, water, 12 oz milk, and in oatmeal. It’s chalky and hard to swallow. My best results have been with the 24 oz of milk or water. I haven’t noticed any difference in performance or muscle growth compared to other protein powders. I like that it’s plant based and chocolate flavored. But it’s difficult to get passed the thick, chalky consistency.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Great for the lactose sensitive.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an alternative protein powder to whey protein because I developed a slight lactose intolerance later in life. This powder has a really great chocolate flavor and I haven't had any digestive issues after drinking it. The chocolate is good on it's own, with a slight grittiness after mixing in a shaker cup. I've also blended it into smoothies where it completely dissolves. The vanilla is more versatile in smoothies, but if I'm just using a shaker cup, the chocolate is great by itself.
customer_reviews.author: CT

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this stuff. I sometimes use it as a healthy substitute for lunch, when I want something that isn't heavy and I have time to clean the blender. I usually blend two scoops in the blender, with ice, avocado, frozen cubed mango, frozen blueberries, frozen slices of banana, and water. Random combinations of things. I like how the chocolate mix tastes and I do feel like it has helped with my weight, while combining it with a consistent exercise regimen. It's a protein mix that doesn't make me feel weird.
customer_reviews.author: K W

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for pregnancy and after!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I used this before, during and now after my pregnancy + breastfeeding. It is my quick and easy breakfast mixed with almond milk. This is a very clean and healthy protien powder. This is sold by weight so the container is half full upon opening. Container size could be down graded to accommodate the weight better.
customer_reviews.author: DesignerGal

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Good chocolate protein powder. Low sugar. Clean. Organic. Has the nutrients that I want. I am impressed with the recent "prevention" award for best clean packaged food. A helpful dietary item for a protein supplement, dessert substitute or treat. I eat it mixed to pudding consistency with a small amount of filtered cold (refrigerated) water. Plain. Better water makes for better tasting mix. Cold makes better than cool. Filtered better than non filtered. This is the only protein product that I use, other than regular food and meals. Also a plus is the few ingredients and lack of synthetic vitamins.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: not chocolate
customer_reviews.text: tastes like plain pea protein, nothing like chocolate. if you have never had pea protein before and only whey you will be in for a shock. really disappointed. mixes well though... no dairy intolerance issues. has a slightly chalky aftertaste. but seriously stick with the pb its not great but its better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love! Used it for years now! Originally bought from amazon for a year. Found a better price deal on this same product at Costco! So I would shop around to get the best price on this product. It’s amazing! Wonders! Love it for everyday, and double scoops and intense workout days. Best and healthiest protein powder out there!!
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Best flavor, consistency and not too sweet...
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this organic protein and drink it every day. Lactose intolerant and mostly vegan this protein is the BEST! I also I'm SUPER picky about what I eat (no soy, GMO, etc.) and super sensitive to sugary proteins. I've tried so many and either the consistency is too "pea" like, hemp like or WAY too sweet. This is the PERFECT protein for me with the best consistency, chocolate flavor, and not too sweet.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Lori

customer_reviews.title: Good taste, good quality
customer_reviews.text: My favorite protein shake. The chocolate is the best flavor, vanilla tastes too sweet and artificial in my opinion. It’s great in shakes and helps me feel fuller, longer. I also like that it’s plant based - whey does not agree with my stomach. Best of all, it’s a great price point for my husband and I to both drink.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Complete protein
customer_reviews.text: good flavor, organic and fills me up Amino acid profile: Alanine 926 mg Arginine 1344 mg Asparagine/Aspartic Acid 1434 mg Cysteine/Cystine 416 mg Glutamine 3013 mg Glycine 748 mg Histidine* 359 mg Isoleucine* † 661 mg Leucine* † 1394 mg Lysine* 475 mg Methionine* 487 mg Phenylalanine* 909 mg Proline 976 mg Serine 855 mg Threonine* 601 mg Tryptophan* 185 mg Tyrosine 895 mg Valine* † 949 mg
customer_reviews.author: Chris Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't make me sick (yay). Tastes good but not great.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second best protein powder I've tried. Most animal-based protein powders make me sick, so just the fact that I don't get sick from this one is a plus. The best protein powder I've tried is Vega plant based protein powder, but it is twice as expensive as Orgain. Orgain is miles better than the amazon brand organic protein mix (revly). It kind of tastes like stevia, so if that bothers you, you won't like this. If you use a hand-shake blender bottle instead of a real blender, it will come out kind of chalky, but the chalkiness isnt bad and you get used to that pretty quick.
customer_reviews.author: Jaspurr

customer_reviews.title: So smooth And delicious no chalky taste !!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far one of the best protein shake flavors I have ever used. It is great with regular milk almond milk soy milk or even water. If you are a chocolate lover you will truly love the taste of this protein shake. It does not have a chalky taste instead it is very smooth and creamy. I tried to blend this with fruits but I did not like the taste of it. The only true that went well with this protein shake as bananas. This protein shake is very low in carbs and keeps you full for a few hours. I highly recommend this protein shake.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Hamadi

customer_reviews.title: Great nutritional product
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this product to the point that I'm a subscribe and save subscriber however this month I didn't get my 2 containers I order each month. and I'm disappointed. so, beware of your orders and the amount your supposed to get each month. and I got no notice about it being short.
customer_reviews.author: LaFaye

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this so much!! This is literally my first week trying a Vegan diet and trying plant based protein. We buy the standard proteins at our local Nutrishop but I needed a Vegan protein and fast so got on Amazon and ordered this based on reviews. If I recall correctly I have seen this at Costco but Prime is so convenient I hardly go to stores now a days. I have mixed this with water, ice or a banana and ice and almond milk and tastes great.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica V.

customer_reviews.title: Bad Batch?
customer_reviews.text: We have ordered this product for a couple years and it has always been amazing and tasted delicious. But this last canister definitely tastes bad and wrong and a lot like chemicals. I don’t know if it’s something with quality control or what but I honestly can barely choke it down. Hope it’s a one time deal...
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Thomas

customer_reviews.title: What in the world happened?
customer_reviews.text: I used to buy this product in the past and there is no issue with the flavor. It tastes great and works well; However, I started using the product on 03/04 and by 03/14 the tub was empty. Considering that this would only be 9 servings (I work out 5 days a week and use this as during my workout), this makes no sense. In a tub that should yield 20 servings, this seems to be a very suspicious issue and makes me wonder what happened here and if this is a case of fraud? I am definitely not going to buy this one again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality - Yes! Amount of Product -No!
customer_reviews.text: Product quality is great and I was full for 4-5 hours following consumption. What I dislike is how empty the bottle is. Literally 50% of the bottle has product. Why not change the container size to accommodate the amount of product that is actually being sold because the existing containers are NOWHERE near full or even 75%. The 3 stars is for amount of product not the quality. The taste reminds me of chocolate milkshake.
customer_reviews.author: Tequa Taylor

product_meta.title: Orgain Organic Plant Based Protein Powder, Creamy Chocolate Fudge - Vegan, Low Net Carbs, Non Dairy, Gluten Free, Lactose Free, No Sugar Added, Soy Free, Kosher, Non-GMO, 2.03 Pound
product_meta.description: Size:2.03 Pound (Pack of 1)| Style:Chocolate| *:Protein PowderOrgain Organic Creamy Chocolate Fudge Protein Powder is a naturally smooth and delicious nourishment drink with 21 grams of organic protein and 7 grams of organic fiber per serving. Each serving is USDA organic, gluten free, kosher, vegan, non-GMO, soy free. No artificial flavors, colors or preservatives. This protein shake powder is great to mix with water or milk post workout or while you're on the go through your busy day. This is great for the entire family including kids.
feature_bullets: Includes 1 (2.03 pound) orgain organic plant based creamy chocolate fudge protein powder
21 grams of organic plant based protein (pea, brown rice, chia seeds), 6 grams of organic dietary fiber, 3 grams of net carbs, 0 grams of sugar, 150 calories per serving
Mix with water, milk, or your favorite protein shake recipe for a quick breakfast or snack drink. Use when bakin grams to give your cakes, muffins, brownies, or cookies a protein and energy boost
Ideal for healthy, on the go nutrition for men, women, and kids. These are great for meal replacement, smoothie boosters, built-in grams lean muscle, muscle recovery, and pre or post workouts
We simply advise against using a microwave as it may negatively impact the nutritional value of the product.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
